_sText:
This map in not made for playing, it is only for the contest. I will make it playabe sometime in future. It needs to be optimized, to be added some more spawn points, maybe more opened areas.





The map has creepy halloween theme, small abandoned vilage with a graveyard. Thunderstorm included, a creepy raven in the graveyard, some blood and evel forest.


PP: It is for Counter Strike: Source



	Update
	1. Removed the func_smokevolume.
	2. Lowered the rain sound.
	3. Increased the framerate in the village twice.
	4. Added more lights.
	5. Added light from the pumpkins.
	6. Added env_fog_controller.
